TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从选择的 选择状态 更改为取消选择或取消选择选择时，将发生此事件。The event occurs when the selection state of a changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected. 如果处于虚拟模式，则不会发生 。The will not occur if the is in virtual mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
